title: Virtual World-Based English Communication Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English communication skills and understanding of job-specific technical terminology
context.additional_context: A training program for in-service professionals to develop advanced English communication skills required in the social sector, focusing on practical competency through role-playing, discussions, and project-based activities in a virtual world platform.

learning_goals: Perform role-playing in virtual world environments by utilizing work-related English expressions with over 80% accuracy
Conduct discussion activities to solve job-related problems in English with peers using collaboration tools in virtual worlds at least three times
Present project outcomes built in virtual spaces in English and incorporate at least five peer feedback suggestions
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
